entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 3 except minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 except minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Snow or periods of rain late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
